com.tymeac.base

Class ServerSecurityModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tymeac.base.ServerSecurityModule

  • public class ServerSecurityModule
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a basic security module for constructing a LoginContext and logging in.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        protected static javax.security.auth.login.LoginContext getContext(TyBase Ty)
        Construct a LoginContext with the String from the base storage field. This value comes from the TymeacStartup.class. The start up gets it either from the Tymeac configuration file when using a DBMS or the TyVariables.class when in stand alone mode.
        Returns:
        a basic LoginContext without a call back handler

      • login

        protected static boolean login(javax.security.auth.login.LoginContext context)
        Try to log in using the LoginContext formed above.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        successful or not
